pair.title: Please log in to your Tibber account
pair.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your email address and password and try again.
pair.alertNoCarFound: No Polestar 2 found on your Tibber account.

pair.title: Please log in to your Polestar account
pair.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your email address and password and try again.
pair.alertNoCarFound: No Polestar 2 found on your Polestar account.
pair.fetchingCars: Fetching Polestar 2 from your Polestar account...
pair.pairInfo: Your Polestar account information is only used to connect your Polestar 2 to Homey. Your login data is only stored locally on your Homey.
